data.message: You might not ever read this... and I know I'm gonna sound like a mom, but we're arouns the same age... your career will never be over... you have change hip hop and will forever be known as one of the greatest... my husband and i love your music and so do my kids... at least the ones they can hear till they get older... don't let anyone get in your head... love the new stuff, can't wait to buy it...
